item.title: mysql表锁定中不支持清空操作?
item.description: 偶然发现这个问题 mysql> lock table test_my write; Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec) mysql> select * from test_my; Empty set (0.00 sec) mysql> insert into test_my values(null, 1, 1); Query OK, 1 row affected (0.00 sec) mysql> select * from test_my; +—-+——+——–+ | id | pid | enable | +—-+——+——–+ | 1 | 1 | 1 | +—-+——+——–+ 1 row in set (0.00 sec) mysql> truncate table test_my; ERROR 1192 (HY000): Can't execute the given command because you have active lock ed tables or an active transaction TRUNCATE TABLE was not allowed under LOCK TABLES.
